messageBody:
Hi Mike,

Interesting concept! I have toyed with the same ideas when we
developed dynamic suites. In rMock, please have a look at them, I
think that you would find them interesting:
http://rmock.sourceforge.net/dynamicsuites.html

Together with your custom TestSuite and a custom DynamicSuite action I
think the rule-based nature of DynamicSuites would complement your
ideas nicely.

We developed dynamic suites mainly to be able to dynamically generate
an allTests suite (that is much faster than finding all tests via ant
or maven atleast when using the fork option).

I think that your ideas of finding classes to test would fit like a
glove in the dynamic suite concept. It would be interesting to get
your (and anyone elses) feedback on this.

Best regards!
Joakim Ohlrogge
